member.name: Windows.DiscoverManagementService
member.summary: Discovers the MDM service. The discovery process uses the[MS-MDE]: Mobile Device Enrollment Protocolprotocol.
member.param: Address of a NULL-terminated Unicode string containing the user principal name (UPN) of the user requesting registration.
Address of a structure that contains pointers to the URIs of the management and authentication services.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.DiscoverManagementServiceEx
member.summary: Discovers the MDM service using a candidate server. The discovery process uses the[MS-MDE]: Mobile Device Enrollment Protocolprotocol.
member.param: Address of a NULL-terminated Unicode string containing the user principal name (UPN) of the user requesting registration.
Address of a NULL-terminated Unicode string containing the discovery service candidate to use in lieu of automatic discovery.
Address of a structure that contains pointers to the URIs of the management and authentication services.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.GetDeviceManagementConfigInfo
member.summary: Gets the config info associated with the provider ID.
member.param: A string containing the provider ID.
A pointer to the buffer length (the size of configString in chars).

param.name: configString
param.para: A buffer which, if the function completes successfully, will contain the config info.

If the buffer isn't large enough to hold the data, then the function returns ERROR_MORE_DATA, and stores the required buffer size in the variable pointed to by configStringBufferLength. In that case, the contents of the configString buffer are undefined.

member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: Windows.GetDeviceRegistrationInfo
member.param: Contains the maximum length that can be returned through the pszHyperlinkparameter.
Details of the device registration.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. .

member.name: Windows.GetManagementAppHyperlink
member.summary: Retrieves the management app hyperlink associated with the MDM service.
member.param: Contains the maximum length that can be returned through the pszHyperlinkparameter.
Address of a buffer that receives the NULL-terminated Unicode string with the hyperlink of the management app associated with the management service.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.IsDeviceRegisteredWithManagement
member.summary: Checks whether the device is registered with an MDM service. If the device is registered, it also returns the user principal name (UPN) of the registered user.
member.param: Address of a BOOL indicates whether the device is registered.
Contains the maximum length that can be returned through the pszUPNparameter.

Optional address of a buffer that receives the NULL-terminated Unicode string containing the UPN of the user registered with the management service. If pszUPN isNULL then the BOOL pointed to by thepfIsDeviceRegisteredWithManagement parameter is updated to indicate whether the device is registered and the function returns ERROR_SUCCESS.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS and theBOOL pointed to by thepfIsDeviceRegisteredWithManagement parameter contains TRUEor FALSE. If TRUE, the Unicode string pointed to by thepszUPN parameter contains the UPN of the registered user. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

If the buffer size indicated by the cchUPN parameter is too small then the call will fail withSTRSAFE_E_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER but the BOOL pointed to by the pfIsDeviceRegisteredWithManagement parameter will be updated to indicate whether the device is registered.

member.name: Windows.IsManagementRegistrationAllowed
member.summary: Checks whether MDM registration is allowed by local policy.
member.param: Address of a BOOL that receives a value indication whether registration is allowed.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS and the BOOL pointed to by the pfIsManagementRegistrationAllowed parameter contains TRUE or FALSE. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.RegisterDeviceWithManagement
member.summary: Registers a device with a MDM service, using the[MS-MDE]: Mobile Device Enrollment Protocol.

param.name: pszUPN
param.para: Address of a NULL-terminated Unicode string containing the user principal name (UPN) of the user requesting the registration.
Windows 8.1: This parameter was located after the ppszMDMServiceUri parameter in Windows 8.1.

member.param: Address of a NULL-terminated Unicode string containing the URI of the MDM service.
Address of a NULL-terminated Unicode string containing a token acquired from a Secure Token Service which the management service will use to validate the user.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.RegisterDeviceWithManagementUsingAADCredentials
member.summary: Registers a device with a MDM service, using Azure Active Directory (AAD) credentials.
member.param: The User to impersonate when attempting to get AAD token
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.RegisterDeviceWithManagementUsingAADDeviceCredentials
member.summary: Registers a device with a MDM service, using Azure Active Directory (AAD) device credentials.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.SetDeviceManagementConfigInfo
member.summary: Sets the config info associated with the provider ID.
member.param: A string containing the provider ID.
A string containing containing the config info (the data to write).
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: Windows.SetManagedExternally
member.summary: Indicates to the MDM agent that the device is managed externally and is not to be registered with an MDM service.
member.param: If TRUE this device is not to be registered with an MDM service. IfFALSE this device can be registered with an MDM service.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.

member.name: Windows.UnregisterDeviceWithManagement
member.summary: Unregisters a device with the MDM service
member.param: TRUE if resources are to be removed during unregistration,FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is ERROR_SUCCESS. If the function fails, the returned value describes the error. Possible values include those listed atMDM Registration Error Values.
